StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetAssignedProgramData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int AS
SELECT PA.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, PA.PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE, PG.PROGRAM_ID, PG.PROGRAM_CODE, PG.PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA ON (C.CONTRACT_ID = PA.CONTRACT_ID AND C.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) INNER JOIN PROGRAM PG ON PA.PROGRAM_ID = PG.PROGRAM_ID
